revision.text:
<!--과학자_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Scientist
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 태어난 날 | ontologyProperty = birthDate }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 태어난 곳 | ontologyProperty = birthPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 죽은 날 | ontologyProperty = deathDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 죽은 곳 | ontologyProperty = deathPlace }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 거주지 | ontologyProperty = residence }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 시민권 | ontologyProperty = citizenship }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국적 | ontologyProperty = nationality }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수상 | ontologyProperty = award }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종교 | ontologyProperty = religion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영향 | ontologyProperty = influencedBy }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영향줌 | ontologyProperty = influenced }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요 업적 | ontologyProperty = knownFor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 분야 | ontologyProperty = field }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지도교수 | ontologyProperty = doctoralAdvisor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 지도학생 | ontologyProperty = doctoralStudent }}
end}}

 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|인종      =
|소속      = 
-->
